HediffDef.label: Dnaide Sickness
HediffDef.labelNoun: Sickness from having a Dnaium transfusion
HediffDef.description: This pawn has been in the Creation Chamber, whether you had an operation or not...This pawn will be in a coma for a few days. Being in the chamber means the pawn has inhaled dnaium particles (no matter how many) in a very close proximity and Dnaium is still a bit potent to a pawn but not as much as injesting or a full Dnide gas out.

HediffDef.label: Super Speed
HediffDef.labelNoun: You have obtained the power of Super speed, just like the ancient Earth God Hermes
HediffDef.description: Super Speed is the power to run at an extreme pace and do tasks at an extremely fast workspeed. The downfall of this and all powers is that you are more likely to collapse from exaustion just like all powers
